questions.text: Who was applying to live in the ecopod in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Frasier said the ecopod was designed by one of Lilith's colleagues. The others offered to sign a petition for Cliff to go live there.

Henri.

	Woody was still on his honeymoon. So when Henri came in asking Sam to turn him down for a job, Sam said he needed him too much while Woody was away.

questions.text: Who did Sam send for help for their smoking?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	He sent her to Dr. Kluger's No Mercy Clinic. Rebecca had promised not to smoke in the office after she set the bar on fire, however she couldn't quit.

questions.text: When Dr. Kluger said "No one has ever gotten past 50", how did the person sent to see him respond?
questions.explanation:
I had 50 in the van.

	The Kluger's method to make a person quit is to smoke one cigarette after the other until she can smoke no more. Rebecca had shown to be up for the challenge.

questions.text: Who said, "Well, the king of babes is dead"?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Sam wouldn't get involved in a phone number contest with Henri. Frasier praised Sam for this, but as soon as Sam was out of earshot he said to the others, "Well the king of babes is dead."

questions.text: What did Norm suggest to Cliff that made them both laugh?
questions.correct: They live their own lives and not vicariously through someone else.
options: They get help for their drinking problem.
They think of a great invention and become independently wealthy.
They get off their bar stools and go to work.
They live their own lives and not vicariously through someone else.
questions.explanation:
They live their own lives and not vicariously through someone else.

	Cliff suggested that they live vicariously through Henri. Norm said they should get off their butts and live so someone can live vicariously through them. He didn't get through the statement before he burst into laughter.

questions.text: Why did Sam finally agree to join in the phone number contest?
options: He wanted to prove he was still King of the Babes.
He was bored and wanted some action.
questions.explanation:
Henri insulted Americans.

	Cliff and a few others were going to challenge Henri. Sam told them to sit down and asked Carla to get "the babe kit".

questions.text: Which is *not* one of the things Carla mentioned was in the "babe kit"?
options: 1st edition of his little black book
questions.explanation:
Smoking jacket.

	Sam said that opening the box was a one time thing. He said he kept the box because he hoped to one day have a son.

questions.text: Did the person who was sent for treatment get a diploma from Dr. Kluger?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	She did not quit smoking, however. In fact, she had Dr. Kluger smoking as well.

questions.text: Who won the phone number contest, Henri or Sam?
questions.explanation:
Henri.

	Sam lost in the last two minutes. However, Sam then had three women who did everything together. So the others started chanting "USA! USA!" because Sam was still the "king of the babes".
